name: agropal
description: AI-powered agricultural platform built with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run install:frontend && cd frontend && npm run build && cp -r build/* ../public/ && echo 'Build completed successfully - Output in public directory'
scripts.build:check: cd frontend && npm run build && ls -la build/ && echo 'Build directory contents verified'
scripts.deploy:check: echo 'Checking deployment readiness...' && ls -la public/ || echo 'Public directory not found - run npm run build first'

author: Agropal Team
